com.epam.onlineshop.rerouting

Class OrdersRerouting

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.onlineshop.rerouting.OrdersRerouting

  • public class OrdersRerouting
extends java.lang.Object
    The OrdersRerouting class responsible for redirection after operations associated with orders.

    2016-09-01
    Version:
    1.0

      • redirectAfterAddTempProductsOrder

        public static void redirectAfterAddTempProductsOrder(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                     javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                     int productId,
                                                     int numberOfPackages)
                                              throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        Redirect after add temp order for user
        Parameters:
        request - parameter to the required to obtain data from the JSP, to redirect data to the JSP and session management
        response - parameter necessary for response to the client
        productId - id of product which ordered
        numberOfPackages - number of packages of product
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - Defines a general exception a servlet can throw when it encounters difficulty.
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
